title: 思科出Email叫員工暫時唔好去中國

replies.msg:

On Friday, an email purportedly sent by Cisco to its employees was circulated and seen by Channel NewsAsia.

The email, titled Travel Restriction to China, said that Cisco was "implementing a restriction of all non-essential travel by US-based Cisco employees into China" due to "recent events surrounding the arrest of a Chinese citizen in Canada on the request of United States law enforcement authorities".

A company spokesperson later told Channel NewsAsia that the email was “sent in error".

“An email was sent in error to some employees regarding travel to China and does not reflect Cisco policy," the spokesperson said.

"We have not implemented restrictions on travel and normal business travel to China continues."
